data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/jsIxoKIuH6lLt4Y3NW7Tf1BwcIO.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":16,"name":"Animation"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"},{"id":10749,"name":"Romance"}],"homepage":"https://gkids.com/films/only-yesterday/","id":15080,"imdb_id":"tt0102587","origin_country":["JP"],"original_language":"ja","original_title":"おもひでぽろぽろ","overview":"In lyrical switches between the present and the past, Taeko contemplates the arc of her life, and wonders if she has been true to the dreams of her childhood self.","popularity":37.885,"poster_path":"/tOSnFE9e82iH3ZAzSTtuOkBsabJ.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":10342,"logo_path":"/eS79pslnoKbWg7t3PMA9ayl0bGs.png","name":"Studio Ghibli","origin_country":"JP"},{"id":1779,"logo_path":"/41nGzTdCnORYZIZzaGZtfsBwQCl.png","name":"Tokuma Shoten","origin_country":"JP"},{"id":6755,"logo_path":"/c0ENH8QeZLvCACpzCpwvYMy2SDr.png","name":"Nippon Television Network Corporation","origin_country":"JP"},{"id":13411,"logo_path":"/yjF0FwJX69h0yGB6WvQwzUOzBln.png","name":"Hakuhodo","origin_country":"JP"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"JP","name":"Japan"}],"release_date":"1991-07-20","revenue":473110,"runtime":119,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"Japanese","iso_639_1":"ja","name":"日本語"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"I'm going on a trip with Me.","title":"Only Yesterday","video":false,"vote_average":7.368,"vote_count":1057}
